content: the trivia scarf pattern is a simple beginner-friendly project it s easy to construct you only need to know chain single_crochet and double_crochet stitches crochet it to any size you like from a small neck scarf to a large cozy shawl everything is possible for the size shown 31 cm high × 80 cm wide you ll need just one skein of yarn my favorite choices are alpaca silk blends such as drops brushed alpaca silk or zen by lang yarns mohair silk blends or really any yarn you love will also work beautifully this project takes about 6 7 hours to complete
